introduction: Can you pass an Italian A1 level test? Try now. You will have 10 questions. For each question, you will have 3 possible answers. You will also have 5 seconds to answer. If you need more time, you can pause the video. Let's start.

questions.question: With you have five seconds
questions.explanation: The noun donne is a feminine plural so the adjective will be belle adjectivo qualificativo primo gruppo and interesante adjectivo qualificativo secondo gruppo.

questions.question: A
questions.explanation: We need to use the third plural person loro of the present tense of the verb costruire. The conjugation of costruire follows the rule of the verbs ending in ire, in particular of the verbs in isk like pulire, capire, finire, etc. In this case, the full conjugation is: io costruisco, tu costruisci, lui/lei costruisce, noi costruiamo, voi costruite, loro costruiscono.

questions.question: For
questions.correct_answer: amo le porte l'aria del mare
questions.explanation: We use la with nouns starting with s plus consonant z, ps, g, n, y, and vowel. Arya is feminine singular so we need to use la but it starts with the vowel, so we need to use l'apostrophe. Animali is masculine plural starting with the vowel, so we need to use li.

questions.question: Five oni matina bambini e perendaras cola
questions.explanation: In this case we use the reflexive form of the verbs lavare and on.

questions.question: A
questions.correct_answer: una penna, uno zaino, uno s plus consonant, p plus s, y, g, n
questions.explanation: We use una with penna because it is feminine singular. We use uno with zaino because it starts with z. Also, we use uno with s plus consonant, p plus s, y, g, n, and we use uno with the noun cuaderno because it is masculine singular.

questions.question: Seven us especially see
questions.explanation: We use the direct pronoun lo that replaces a computer.

questions.question: Eight dante a firenze
questions.explanation: Dante and nato a Firenze. We need to use the passato prossimo of the verb nascere in the third singular person. We use the auxiliary essere like in most verbs indicating a change, for example, etc., and the irregular past participle of the verb nascere, nato.

questions.question: Nine luca vive parigi
questions.explanation: We usually use the preposition of place a with cities and small islands and the preposition of place in with nations, regions, continents, and big islands.

questions.question: Ten years
questions.explanation: In this case we are talking about Mario's parents, so we need to use con madre because it is feminine singular and con padre because it is masculine singular.
